Circuit String Converter

class CircuitStringConverter(qubits: Sequence[cirq.ops.raw_types.Qid], offset: int = 4)[source]

Bases: object

Converter between Cirq circuits and Qtrl strings.

Initializes a CircuitStringConverter object.

Parameters

  • qubits – The qubits in the circuit.

  • offset – The index offset on the Berkeley device.

convert_strings_to_circuit(strings: List[List[str]]) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit[source]

Converts qtrl strings to a Qiskit circuit.

Parameters

strings – Qtrl strings.

Returns

circuit – A Cirq circuit corresponding to the qtrl strings.

convert_circuit_to_strings(circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit) → List[List[str]][source]

Converts a Cirq circuit to qtrl strings.

Parameters

circuit – A Cirq circuit.

Returns

strings – The qtrl strings corresponding to the Cirq circuit.
